metadata.title: HCP Packer Image - Data Sources
metadata.description:
The HCP Packer Image Data Source retrieves information about an
image from the HCP Packer registry. This information can be used to
provide a source image to various Packer builders.

metadata.title: Packer by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Packer helps you create golden images for multiple platforms from a single source configuration.

alertBanner.text: Our community conference is taking place in San Francisco and online October 10-12.

integrationsConfig.description: A curated collection of official, partner, and community Packer Integrations.
